title: Timucuan Ecological & Historic Preserve: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       We are excited to offer educators materials that help students understand northeast Florida's cultural and natural history. We hope these materials will be used to integrate your classroom with ours.                  Build Your Own Fort Learn local history and let the creativity fly as kids design a fort.               Anna Kingsley A Teacher's Guide Learn about the woman who lived slavery from every angle.               Create a Coat of Arms History becomes personal with this fun and educational activity.               Slaves as Property Students use real documents to explore the past.               Fort Caroline Scavenger Hunt A teacher's tool for guiding your students through the Fort Caroline...
